locations: Televisa San Angel, Mexico City, Distrito Federal, Mexico
imdb.plot outline: This is the story of a young girl who lost her parents in a car accident,after which which her aunt who her father made as her guardian and also in control of the family assets till she turned 18 told her that her father owed a lot of debt so for that reason she had to move to another school, There she befriends a girl who was from a divorced home
imdb.title: In the Name of Love
plot: This is the story of a young girl who lost her parents in a car accident,after which which her aunt who her father made as her guardian and also in control of the family assets till she turned 18 told her that her father owed a lot of debt so for that reason she had to move to another school, There she befriends a girl who was from a divorced home::Dede Nadine Akperi
